snippet: Lamar Hill and two friends recorded some of the first hip-hop records as the Treacherous Three. Today, he is searching for full-time work.
abstract: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund has provided unemployed musician Lamar Hill of the Bronx with emergency funds for back rent, utilities, food and clothing while he attends back-to-work program and volunteering.
lead_paragraph: Lamar Hill and two friends recorded some of the first hip-hop records as the Treacherous Three. Today, he is searching for full-time work.

headline.print_headline: A Pioneer of Rap Music Craves 9-to-5 Stability
